note.p: Burial: Pere la Chaise cemetery, Paris
Education: BA (1792) MA (1797) Balliol College, Oxford

Career: Ordained priest (1796); rector of Aston Somerville, Gloucestershire (1803); Preacher at Berkeley and Grosvenor Chapels, London (1800-1814); went to Paris (1815); chaplain to the British Embassy (1818); chaplain to the Duke of Bridgewater (1824); edited "Don Quixote", "The Arabian Knights" etc
